body:
Packages can define additional properties that affect the spec provenance.

This includes a test for an experimental package that changes depending on which packages depend on it: for example if you have:

```
  W
 / \
X   Y
 \ /
  Z
```

then an instance of Z depended on by `[X@3, Y@3]` is considered different than an instance of Z depended on by `[X@3, Y@2]`.
title: [WIP] Allow packages to define additional spec provenance
